attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Global Warming is Imminent! More than is realised!
Prime Minister, please warn HM Govt as below.
It takes an exact amount of heat to melt ice.[80calories per gram of ice.]But...
1gm of Water heated by 80cal/gram will reach 80deg Centigrade. 100deg C is boiling point. There is a lot of water and little ice left. The heating is from Solar radiation (and the Earths core of radioactive elements) trapped by the polluted atmosphere above ground.
The sea is on its way to boiling point!
If this does not terrify you ask a scientist! He will understand!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
